attributes.action: The right to protect ouselves and our property without reprisal from the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We as a society have spent too long protecting the criminals and not the victims of crime. Too many times people that use force to protect their loved ones and their families are subjected to a force from the law and justice system that is not representative of public opinion. 

We need to be protected by the law, not criminalised for the act of protection regardless of how much force is used. 

When someone enters into a criminal act they lose the right to protection, as the victims the innocents should be afforded more protection.

We ask this government to look at the whole judicial system and the way cases are dealt with and if need be change the law in favour of victims and not criminals.
